p: Viral RNA was extracted using QIAamp Viral RNA extraction kit (QIAGEN) according to the manufacturer’s suggested protocol, and viral RNA was eluted from the spin column in 60 μL of elution buffer. Eluted RNA was divided into aliquots and stored immediately at -80°C until further use. Each sample was tested by one-step real-time RT-PCR for the presence of MV-RNA [ 13], using a QuantStudio 7 Flex Real-Time PCR system (Applied Biosystems).
